greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle defined by g.f. A(x,y) = exp( Sum_{n>=1} x^n/n * Sum_{k=0..n} binomial(n^2, (n-k)*k) * y^k ), as read by rows.
example: The logarithm of the g.f. equals the series:
in which the coefficients form A228836(n,k) = binomial(n^2, (n-k)*k).
program: (PARI) {T(n, k)=polcoeff(polcoeff(exp(sum(m=1, n, x^m/m*sum(j=0, m, binomial(m^2, (m-j)*j)*y^j))+x*O(x^n)), n, x), k, y)}
for(n=0, 10, for(k=0, n, print1(T(n, k), ", ")); print(""))
xref: Cf. A207135 (row sums), A207137 (antidiagonal sums), A228901 (column 1).
Cf. related triangles: A228836 (log), A209196, A228902, A228904.
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Sep 07 2013
